title: Data Driven Blog
subtitle: By dev and design
text: DD Blog is an open source blog engine, built with VueJS and Bootstrap. Feel free to use or change it for your own needs üòé

title: Why to use DD Blog?
subtitle: Reasons
text: Easy way to present your things in one place, using just title, subtitle, few lines of text and links. Get your own high performance and single page app from pure data in minimal design.

title: Requirements
subtitle: Requirements
text: All you need to get started is text editor and hosting to upload files. Basically, you need to edit just JSON. Check the link below to understand how that works.

title: Data Format
text: All posts data is stored at JSON file, everything you see here is generated from that data. For more details please check docs.

title: Post Sorting
text: All post are sorted by tags, top navigation on the left side generated automatically from the JSON data.

title: Planned Features
subtitle: Message to the future
text: Lists view. Images. Line spacing element. WYSIWYG text editor and option to connect DB.

title: Card with Photo
subtitle: Example
text: Every post is built of title, subtitle, photo, icon, text and and link. You can combine these things as you need.
